amendatorysection.catchline: Design-build contract; progressive design-build contract; construction manager-general contract; authorized.
amendatorysection.para: A contracting agency, in accordance with sections 39-2808 to 39-2824, may solicit and execute a design-build contract, a progressive design-build contract, or a construction manager-general contractor contract for a public project, other than a project that is primarily resurfacing, rehabilitation, or restoration.
